abstract: As if Hewlett-Packard does not have enough problems, a widening Foreign Corrupt Practices Act investigation may end up costing the company millions of dollars in legal fees as it deals with demands for documents while conducting its own internal inquiry.
snippet: As if Hewlett-Packard does not have enough problems, a widening Foreign Corrupt Practices Act investigation may end up costing the company millions of dollars in legal fees as it deals with demands for documents while conducting its own internal i...
lead_paragraph: Peter J. Henning follows issues involving securities law and white-collar crime for DealBook’s White Collar Watch.
